title: KeepDo!
summary: Make it a habit with KeepDo!
description: Small but an handy application helps you to manage daily tasks easily and efficiently.Your feedback will highly appreciated and encourage us to improve more on it!Features:- Reminder- Widget- Optimized reminder notification for Android wear- Date change time setting- Select stamps- Backup & Restore- Sort Do list- Show the count of continuous execution of Do as "Combo"
descriptionHTML:
Small but an handy application helps you to manage daily tasks easily and efficiently.
Your feedback will highly appreciated and encourage us to improve more on it!

Features:
- Reminder
- Widget
- Optimized reminder notification for Android wear
- Date change time setting
- Select stamps
- Backup & Restore
- Sort Do list
- Show the count of continuous execution of Do as "Combo"
comments: Nice and simple, a life changing tool I have several hobbies and projects which I would like to work on and use KeepDo for tracking 5 min of my time a day for each one (e.g. read a book, eat vitamins, work on a coding project, go to bed at a predefined time). So far it works great, I can see how little by little it helps me to achieve my goals. I even use it to track things I want to not do (distractions) and it works equally well. Kudos to the author(s)!

Nice and free, small size. If you can add a counter for a task done daily like do drills 2x a day, ability to add notes for a day and also add a symbol for not done but this app is already excellent. Thanks.
